scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.uiTest:test: set CYPRESS_ENV=test && npm run pretest && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/specs/DialcareUI/UIRunner/**/*' --reporter mocha-allure-reporter && npm run posttest
scripts.uiTest:preprod: set CYPRESS_ENV=preprod && npm run pretest && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/specs/DialcareUI/UIRunner/**/*' --reporter mocha-allure-reporter && npm run posttest
